resources.string: Different flavours of Android and some apps may store pictures in unique ways. \n\nIt is unlikely, but not impossible, that profile images get overwritten.
\nBackups are not available in the free version.
Please confirm that you would like to overwrite all contact images.
Enable backups of existing profile pictures before overwriting them.
If you have trouble finding certain contacts in Micopi, enable Deep Search.
An error occurred while assigning this picture to the contact.
An error occurred while trying to save this image as a file on your device. Please make sure your storage is not locked.
%1$s has got a new contact picture.

Would you like to overwrite all images or only generate pictures for contacts that currently do not have one? \n\nChanges made by Micopi cannot be undone. We recommend making a backup of your most precious contacts and pictures, just in case.
After selecting a contact, the generated picture will be previewed before assigning it to that person.

This stores images from your contacts list in the Micopi Media Directory* on your device. Please note that this is merely an experimental assistance. It is recommended to backup your most precious contact pictures in an additional way. \n\nPlease also note, the more images you replace with backups enabled, the more memory storage Micopi is going to use.
Do you want to assign this contact photo to %1$s? \n\nThis change cannot be undone.
